TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SerialDataReceivedEventHandler(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SerialDataReceivedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SerialDataReceivedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SerialDataReceivedEventArgs)
public delegate void SerialDataReceivedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs ^ e);
type SerialDataReceivedEventHandler = delegate of obj * SerialDataReceivedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的发送者，即 对象。

span.span: The sender of the event, which is the object.

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 对象的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).
